data.actual_result: You can now edit the channel name and the channel topic. Fortunately when you hit Save it says Missing Permissions
data.expected_result: Nothing special has to be noticed
data.short_description: [Android 7+, seems specific to some devices, can still repro as of 6.1.9] Splitting your screen on channel settings allows you to edit the channel name and topic, regardless of your permissions
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you don't have Manage channels permission - Pick any channel and go to settings - Split your screen
